comments.body:
Thanks, I didn't know [`<reference types=...>` directive](https://www.typescriptlang.org/docs/handbook/triple-slash-directives.html#-reference-types-) and have just read the doc.

Are you saying this line should be `/// <reference types="google-apps-script" />`? I think it causes kind of recursive reference and does not achieve what I wanted to do; I just wanted to import type declarations such as `GoogleAppsScript.Integer` which is declared in google-apps-script.types.d.ts.

Maybe whole these references could be deleted, as index.d.ts references all files.
